title: @Riot - This Should Probably Be in Report A Bug

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Not sure if this should be in Report A Bug but I'll post this here just for the sake of visibility. I won an ARAM where Ornn was on the enemy team and I got credit for one of the new Ornn missions. The text clearly states "Win 2 games with Ornn on your team", however, he was on the enemy team. I'm not complaining - I'll take what I can get, but I just thought you should know.

replies.body: I've been told that this is actually working as intended. The mission itself seems to be worded incorrectly, and should be updated soon to state "Win 2 games as, with, or against Ornn".
Thanks for the clarification Broporo. That makes a lot more sense considering all the other similar mission have been worded as "play as, with or against...." in the previous missions. Good to know!
